title: Full-viewport vibrant cash-themed background + improved landing hero integration

requirements.summary: Enhance the global AppLayout background to be full-viewport and more vibrant cash-themed (greens + gold accents) while preserving readability in light and dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: Across all routes rendered inside AppLayout, the background visually extends to the full viewport height (no unintended blank bands above/below content).
The background uses a more vibrant cash-themed treatment (e.g., richer green/gold gradient accents) without reducing text contrast or legibility on cards and primary text.
The background remains consistent between pages (Landing, Pricing, Predictions, Account, Admin, Terms, Support, Payment Success/Failure).
Light mode and dark mode both remain usable: body text, headings, and key UI surfaces meet clear contrast against the background.

file_operations.description: Add global base layout height guarantees (html/body/#root) and introduce a reusable global cash-themed background treatment (e.g., layered gradient with green/gold accents) that adapts to light/dark variables while keeping card/text surfaces readable.
Apply the new global background class/structure at the AppLayout root container (keeping min-h-screen and flex layout) so the background consistently fills the viewport across all routed pages.

requirements.summary: Make the Landing hero cash pattern/gradient more vivid and smoothly blended into the global background using the existing generated pattern asset.
acceptanceCriteria: HeroBranding continues to use /assets/generated/cash-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png, but with updated opacity/overlay/gradient so the effect is noticeably more vibrant while still subtle enough for readability.
The hero background transitions smoothly into the rest of the page background (no harsh edge where the hero ends).
No layout overflow is introduced (no unintended horizontal scroll on mobile or desktop).

file_operations.description: Adjust HeroBranding's background layers to keep using the existing generated asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/cash-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png (pattern opacity + additional green/gold overlay/gradient) and update the bottom fade so it blends seamlessly into the global AppLayout background without introducing horizontal overflow.

Review and refine any LandingPage section-level background gradients (e.g., pricing section) so they visually integrate with the updated global + hero backgrounds and do not create a visible seam immediately after the hero.
